# Government Tender Announcement for JTAC VTS and ISS Contract

### Summary
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking to acquire two static Joint Terminal Attack Controller Virtual Training System (JTAC VTS) and In-Service Support and Repair and Overhaul contracts. The JTAC VTS will support the training required to force generate accredited Joint Terminal Attack Controllers (JTAC). The acquisition contract scope includes:

* Providing a static JTAC VTS meeting technical requirements
* Completing project management tasks
* Completing system engineering
* Completing and passing acceptance testing
* Providing certifications
* Providing documentation requirements
* Delivering and installing the static JTAC VTS
* Integrated logistics support
* Providing initial training

The In-Service Support and Repair and Overhaul contract scope includes:

* Program management
* Operating support
* Engineering support
* Maintenance support
* Supply support
* Repair and overhaul
* Additional work requests
* Training

### Security Requirements
Minimum corporate security required: Designated Organization Screening (DOS) - Protected B
Personnel security screening: Reliability Status

### Supporting Documentation
Request for original DND publications referenced in the RFP package must be made as soon as possible to ensure timely receipt.

### Contracting Authority
Contact Sophia Edwards-Letellier at Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) for more information.

### Closing and Evaluation Criteria
Tenders must be received by October 13, 2022 at 2:00 pm EDT. The Contracting Authority will evaluate tenders based on the Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

### Trade Agreements
The tender is subject to the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

### Attachments
Attachments can be found on the Canada Buys website.
